title: What online courses should a biology student take? - Quora

response.answer_text: I took one online class and hated it because I missed the experience of taking notes, asking questions, and interacting with other human beings. It wasn’t much better than reading a textbook. I’m sure other people have different opinions. You could probably do as well with some directed reading. Take a look at the syllabus and reading lists for classes that interest you. Most people find chemistry more of a challenge than biology. If you’re a bio major you’re going to need it. It’s difficult to answer this question because you haven’t shared where you are in your education or what kind of work you plan to do. Perhaps would be better off talking with your academic advisor.
